name: BIPO
description:
Designed for businesses of any size from SMEs to MNCs, our total HR solutions include Human Capital Management solutions, Global Payroll Outsourcing, and Employer of Record service across 150+ global markets.

At BIPO, we understand the power of technology in building the best-in-class solutions. That’s why we leverage our award-winning HR Management System (HRMS), Athena BI, Global Payroll Outsourcing and Employer of Record technology platform to deliver customised services and scalable solutions that automate HR processes, simplify workflows, and generate actionable insights.
features: HR Services for SME & New Business Setup
Headline: Make Life Easier.
ShortDescription: BIPO specialises in delivering global payroll and people solutions that help businesses thrive in today's international market.
enhanced_description: BIPO provides total HR solutions, encompassing Human Capital Management (HCM) solutions, global payroll outsourcing, and Employer of Record (EOR) services across more than 150 global markets. Designed for businesses of all sizes, from SMEs to multinational corporations (MNCs), BIPO leverages its award-winning HR Management System (HRMS) and Athena BI platform. The platform delivers customized and scalable services aimed at automating HR processes, simplifying workflows, and generating actionable insights. Specializing in global payroll and people solutions for the international market, key features also include technology staffing, attendance automation, recruitment and business process outsourcing, flexible benefit management, HR consulting, legal support, and professional employment organization services.
key_use_cases: Global expansion and international hiring without establishing local entities (Employer of Record).
Streamlining and automating core HR processes and workflows.
Managing global payroll across multiple jurisdictions.
Gaining data-driven insights for HR and business strategy (via Business Intelligence).
Sourcing and managing talent through staffing and recruitment services.
Ensuring compliance with international legal and tax regulations.
Administering employee flexible benefits and managing attendance.
Setting up HR operations for new businesses and SMEs.
competitive_advantages: Extensive global reach (150+ markets for EOR and payroll).
Comprehensive 'total HR solutions' including HCM, global payroll, and EOR.
Focus on automation, workflow simplification, and generation of actionable insights.
Specialization in supporting businesses operating in international markets.
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency through HR process automation.
Facilitated global expansion and market entry.
Potential cost savings from outsourcing payroll and administrative tasks.
Ability to scale HR operations with business growth.
primary_users: C-Suite Executives (for MNCs and global expansion)
compliance_features: Support for global legal compliance (through Legal Support & Consulting).
Support for tax compliance (through Finance & Tax Advisory).
scalability_features: Supports businesses of any size from SMEs to MNCs.
